properties.entry: INSERT INTO NOTICE ( NOTICE_NO, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT ) VALUES ( SEQ_NNO.NEXTVAL, ?, ? )
SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM (SELECT NOTICE_NO, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT, CREATE_DATE FROM NOTICE N WHERE N.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM NOTICE WHERE STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT NOTICE_NO, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT FROM NOTICE WHERE NOTICE_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE NOTICE SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE NOTICE_NO = ?
UPDATE NOTICE SET NOTICE_TITLE = ?, NOTICE_CONTENT = ? WHERE NOTICE_NO = ?
SELECT NOTICE_TITLE FROM NOTICE WHERE NOTICE_TITLE = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
